This rule ensures that both the to and from accounts do not exceed the max balance or go below the min balance.","params":{"amount":"total number of tokens to be transferred","balanceFrom":"Token balance of the sender address","balanceTo":"Token balance of the recipient address","fromTags":"tags applied via App Manager to sender address","ruleId":"Uint value of the ruleId storage pointer for applicable rule.","toTags":"tags applied via App Manager to recipient address"}},"checkAccountMinMaxTokenBalanceAMM(uint32,uint32,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,bytes32[])":{"details":"Check the minimum/maximum rule through the AMM Swap","params":{"amountIn":"total number of tokens to be swapped","amountOut":"total number of tokens to be received","fromTags":"tags applied via App Manager to sender address","ruleIdToken0":"Uint value of the ruleId storage pointer for applicable rule.","ruleIdToken1":"Uint value of the ruleId storage pointer for applicable rule.","tokenBalance0":"Token balance of the token being swapped","tokenBalance1":"Token balance of the received token"}},"checkAdminMinTokenBalance(uint32,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Checks that an admin won't hold less tokens than promised until a certain date","params":{"_amountToTransfer":"Number of tokens to be transferred","_currentBalance":"of tokens held by the admin","_ruleId":"Rule identifier for rule arguments"}},"checkBalanceByAccessLevelPasses(uint32,uint8,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Check if transaction passes Balance by AccessLevel rule.","params":{"_accessLevel":"the Access Level of the account","_amountToTransfer":"total number of tokens to be transferred","_balance":"account's beginning balance","_ruleId":"Rule Identifier for rule arguments"}},"checkMinMaxAccountBalanceERC721(uint32,uint256,uint256,bytes32[],bytes32[])":{"details":"Check the MinMaxAccountBalanceERC721 rule. This rule ensures accounts cannot exceed or drop below specified account balances via account tags.","params":{"balanceFrom":"Token balance of the sender address","balanceTo":"Token balance of the recipient address","fromTags":"tags applied via App Manager to sender address","ruleId":"Uint value of the ruleId storage pointer for applicable rule.","toTags":"tags applied via App Manager to recipient address"}},"checkPauseRules(address)":{"details":"This function checks if the requested action is valid according to pause rules.","params":{"_dataServer":"address of the Application Rule Processor Diamond contract"}},"checkTokenMaxBuyVolume(uint32,uint256,uint256,uint64,uint256)":{"details":"Function receives a rule id, retrieves the rule data and checks if the TokenMaxBuyVolume Rule passes","params":{"amountToTransfer":"total number of tokens to be transferred in transaction.","currentTotalSupply":"total supply value passed in by the handler. This is for ERC20 tokens with a fixed total supply.","lastPurchaseTime":"time of the most recent purchase from AMM. This starts the check if current transaction is within a purchase window.","ruleId":"id of the rule to be checked"}},"checkTokenMaxDailyTrades(uint32,uint256,bytes32[],uint64)":{"details":"This function receives a rule id, which it uses to get the TokenMaxDailyTrades rule to check if the transfer is valid.","params":{"lastTransferTime":"block.timestamp of most recent transaction from sender.","nftTags":"NFT tags applied","ruleId":"Rule identifier for rule arguments","transfersWithinPeriod":"Number of transfers within the time period"}},"checkTokenMaxSellVolume(uint32,uint256,uint256,uint64,uint256)":{"details":"Function receives a rule id, retrieves the rule data and checks if the TokenMaxSellVolume Rule passes","params":{"amountToTransfer":"total number of tokens to be transferred in transaction.","currentTotalSupply":"total supply value passed in by the handler. This is for ERC20 tokens with a fixed total supply.","lastSellTime":"time of the most recent purchase from AMM. This starts the check if current transaction is within a purchase window.","ruleId":"id of the rule to be checked","totalSoldInPeriod":"total amount of tokens sold during period."}},"checkTokenMaxSupplyVolatility(uint32,int256,uint256,uint256,int256,uint64)":{"details":"Rule checks if the tokenMaxSupplyVolatility rule will be violated.","params":{"_amount":"Number of tokens to be minted/burned","_lastSupplyUpdateTime":"the time of the last transfer","_ruleId":"Rule identifier for rule arguments","_supply":"Number of tokens in supply","_totalSupplyForPeriod":"token total supply updated at begining of period","_volumeTotalForPeriod":"token's increase/decreased volume total in period"},"returns":{"_0":"volumeTotal new accumulated volume"}},"checkTokenMaxTradingVolume(uint32,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint64)":{"details":"Rule checks if the token max trading volume rule will be violated.","params":{"_amount":"Number of tokens to be transferred from this account","_lastTransferTime":"the time of the last transfer","_ruleId":"Rule identifier for rule arguments","_supply":"Number of tokens in supply","_volume":"token's trading volume thus far"},"returns":{"_0":"volumeTotal new accumulated volume"}},"checkTokenMinHoldTime(uint32,uint256)":{"details":"This function receives data needed to check Minimum hold time rule. This a simple rule and thus is not stored in the rule storage diamond.","params":{"_holdHours":"minimum number of hours the asset must be held","_ownershipTs":"beginning of hold period"}},"checkTokenMinTxSize(uint32,uint256)":{"details":"Check the TokenMinTxSize rule. assessAMMFee(uint32,uint256).details: Assess the fee associated with the AMM Fee Rule

params._collateralizedTokenAmount: total number of collateralized tokens to be swapped(this could be the "token in" or "token out" as the fees are always * assessed from the collateralized token)

checkAccountApproveDenyOracles((uint32,b.details: This function receives an array of rule ids, which it uses to get the oracle details, then calls the oracle to determine permissions.

checkAccountMaxBuySize(uint32,uint256,ui.details: This function receives a rule id for AccountMaxBuySize details and checks that transaction passes.

params.amount: Number of tokens to be transferred
params.boughtInPeriod: Number of tokens purchased within purchase Period
params.lastUpdateTime: block.timestamp of most recent transaction from sender.
params.toTags: Account tags applied to sender via App Manager

checkAccountMaxSellSize(uint32,uint256,u.details: This function receives a rule id for AccountMaxSellSize details and checks that transaction passes.

params.amount: Number of tokens to be transferred
params.fromTags: Account tags applied to sender via App Manager
params.lastUpdateTime: block.timestamp of most recent transaction from sender.

checkAccountMaxTxValueByRiskScore(uint32.details: Rule that checks if the tx exceeds the limit size in USD for a specific risk profile within a specified period of time.this check will cause a revert if the new value of _valueTransactedInPeriod in USD exceeds the limit for the address risk profile.

params._valueTransactedInPeriod: the cumulative amount of tokens recorded in the last period.
params.amount: in USD of the current transaction with 18 decimals of precision.
params.lastTxDate: timestamp of the last transfer of this token by this address.

returns._0: updated value for the _valueTransactedInPeriod. If _valueTransactedInPeriod are inside the current period, then this value is accumulated. If not, it is reset to current amount.

checkAccountMaxValueByAccessLevel(uint32.details: This function checks if the requested action is valid according to the AccountMaxValueByAccessLevel rule

params._accessLevelTo: the Access Level of the recepient account
params._amountToTransfer: total dollar amount to be transferred in USD with 18 decimals of precision
params._totalValueTo: recepient account's beginning balance in USD with 18 decimals of precision

checkAccountMaxValueByRiskScore(uint32,a.details: This function checks if the requested action is valid according to the AccountMaxValueByRiskScore rule

params._amountToTransfer: total dollar amount to be transferred in USD with 18 decimals of precision
params._riskScoreTo: the Risk Score of the recepient account
params._totalValueTo: recepient account's beginning balance in USD with 18 decimals of precision

checkAccountMaxValueOutByAccessLevel(uin.details: Rule that checks if the value out exceeds the limit size in USD for a specific access level

params._accessLevel: access level of the sending account
params._withdrawal: the amount, in USD, of previously withdrawn assets

checkAccountMinMaxTokenBalance(uint32,ui.details: Check the AccountMinMaxTokenBalance rule. This rule ensures that both the to and from accounts do not exceed the max balance or go below the min balance.

params.amount: total number of tokens to be transferred
params.balanceFrom: Token balance of the sender address
params.balanceTo: Token balance of the recipient address
params.fromTags: tags applied via App Manager to sender address
params.ruleId: Uint value of the ruleId storage pointer for applicable rule.
params.toTags: tags applied via App Manager to recipient address

checkAccountMinMaxTokenBalanceAMM(uint32.details: Check the minimum/maximum rule through the AMM Swap

params.amountIn: total number of tokens to be swapped
params.amountOut: total number of tokens to be received
params.fromTags: tags applied via App Manager to sender address
params.ruleIdToken0: Uint value of the ruleId storage pointer for applicable rule.
params.ruleIdToken1: Uint value of the ruleId storage pointer for applicable rule.
params.tokenBalance0: Token balance of the token being swapped
params.tokenBalance1: Token balance of the received token

checkAdminMinTokenBalance(uint32,uint256.details: Checks that an admin won't hold less tokens than promised until a certain date

params._amountToTransfer: Number of tokens to be transferred
params._currentBalance: of tokens held by the admin

checkBalanceByAccessLevelPasses(uint32,u.details: Check if transaction passes Balance by AccessLevel rule.

params._accessLevel: the Access Level of the account
params._amountToTransfer: total number of tokens to be transferred

checkMinMaxAccountBalanceERC721(uint32,u.details: Check the MinMaxAccountBalanceERC721 rule. This rule ensures accounts cannot exceed or drop below specified account balances via account tags.

params.balanceFrom: Token balance of the sender address
params.balanceTo: Token balance of the recipient address
params.fromTags: tags applied via App Manager to sender address
params.ruleId: Uint value of the ruleId storage pointer for applicable rule.
params.toTags: tags applied via App Manager to recipient address

checkPauseRules(address).details: This function checks if the requested action is valid according to pause rules.

params._dataServer: address of the Application Rule Processor Diamond contract

checkTokenMaxBuyVolume(uint32,uint256,ui.details: Function receives a rule id, retrieves the rule data and checks if the TokenMaxBuyVolume Rule passes

params.amountToTransfer: total number of tokens to be transferred in transaction.
params.currentTotalSupply: total supply value passed in by the handler. This is for ERC20 tokens with a fixed total supply.
params.lastPurchaseTime: time of the most recent purchase from AMM. This starts the check if current transaction is within a purchase window.
params.ruleId: id of the rule to be checked

checkTokenMaxDailyTrades(uint32,uint256,.details: This function receives a rule id, which it uses to get the TokenMaxDailyTrades rule to check if the transfer is valid.

params.lastTransferTime: block.timestamp of most recent transaction from sender.
params.transfersWithinPeriod: Number of transfers within the time period

checkTokenMaxSellVolume(uint32,uint256,u.details: Function receives a rule id, retrieves the rule data and checks if the TokenMaxSellVolume Rule passes

params.amountToTransfer: total number of tokens to be transferred in transaction.
params.currentTotalSupply: total supply value passed in by the handler. This is for ERC20 tokens with a fixed total supply.
params.lastSellTime: time of the most recent purchase from AMM. This starts the check if current transaction is within a purchase window.
params.ruleId: id of the rule to be checked
params.totalSoldInPeriod: total amount of tokens sold during period.

checkTokenMaxSupplyVolatility(uint32,int.details: Rule checks if the tokenMaxSupplyVolatility rule will be violated.

params._amount: Number of tokens to be minted/burned
params._lastSupplyUpdateTime: the time of the last transfer
params._totalSupplyForPeriod: token total supply updated at begining of period
params._volumeTotalForPeriod: token's increase/decreased volume total in period

checkTokenMaxTradingVolume(uint32,uint25.details: Rule checks if the token max trading volume rule will be violated.

params._amount: Number of tokens to be transferred from this account
params._lastTransferTime: the time of the last transfer

checkTokenMinHoldTime(uint32,uint256).details: This function receives data needed to check Minimum hold time rule. This a simple rule and thus is not stored in the rule storage diamond.

params._holdHours: minimum number of hours the asset must be held

checkTokenMinTxSize(uint32,uint256).details: Check the TokenMinTxSize rule. This rule ensures accounts cannot transfer less than the specified amount.

params.amount: total number of tokens to be transferred
params.ruleId: Uint value of the ruleId storage pointer for applicable rule.
